page.title: 12TRAINS.....PEOPLE
page.content:
At Hornsey Depot Electric Trains (class no.312 and 313) are cleaned and serviced and maintained. The new{High {Speed Electric Train}(H.S.E.T.) class no.225 is currently being tested on track in the Hornsey sidings.
Many people from other countries come to make their home in Wood Green, usually because they have friends or relatives already living there. Though there is unemployment some jobs can be obtained; housing is fairly cheap and there are many rooms to be let. There are Shops, Clubs, Banks and Places of Worship especially for immigrants and there is good Public Transport to reach other areas. They will probably settle in quickly and easily because of the {Multi-Ethnic}nature of the community.
